text: Franklin J. "Frank" Biondi, Jr. (January 9, 1945 â€“ November 25, 2019) was an American businessman and entertainment executive. He held leadership roles at Viacom, Universal Studios, and HBO. ==Early life== Biondi was born Franklin J. Biondi, Jr. in New York City, New York on January 9, 1945. ==Death== On November 25, 2019, Biondi died of bladder cancer in Los Angeles at the age of 74.Frank Biondi Jr., Former Viacom and Universal Studios Head, Dies at 74 ==References== ==Other websites== * Frank Biondi's profile on Forbes Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from bladder cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from New Jersey Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:People from Livingston, New Jersey Category:Princeton University alumni
